AjaXplorer Selenium Tests

To run these test, first you have to install the Selenium IDE as an extension to Firefox.

+ 0pen the test suite "GUITestSuite.html" in Selenium
+ The basic "admin" with password "admin" must have access to the default repository "Default Files" (must be called Default Files like ine the distrbution).
+ Create a new empty directory anywhere
+ Run the test cases at "slow" pace, so that various submissions have time fulfill.
